name: Banana Brawl
description:
Fight against friends as six unique banana characters in this platform fighter!

Press F to start and to interact with menus, along with WASD.

P1: WASD to move, F to attack, Shift to jump.

P2: IJKL to move, Apostrophe to attack, Space to jump.

Attacks work similar to other platform fighters— hold a direction (or neutral) and press attack. There are only grounded an aerial attacks, and there's no shielding.

Lots more is planned for the future, including more characters and an online mode!
